title: (x) Body text in old book by Peter Rosegger - Alt-Mediaeval {Wolfgang Mayer}
content:
This is from a book by Peter Rosegger, I'd expected it would have been printed in Blackletter, but no - any idea about the typeface?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022052932im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Waldbauern_4691.jpg)
author: tina

comments.content: I would like to know this too, very nice sample.
Looks Bernhard but I can’t find a match.
This is the regular cut of Alt-Mediaeval. Cut in 1915 by M. Hertwig for Berthold.

Thank you.

Was this typeface widely used?
